name: siav
description: Sistema Inteligente de Assistência à Vida - App médico para PCR/ACLS

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: terser script.js -o build-optimized/script.min.js --compress --mangle --comments false && terser settings-integration.js -o build-optimized/settings-integration.min.js --compress --mangle --comments false
scripts.build:css: npm run purgecss && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: postcss build-optimized/style.css -o build-optimized/style.min.css --use cssnano && postcss build-optimized/shock-styles.css -o build-optimized/shock-styles.min.css --use cssnano
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build pronto! Envie a pasta build-optimized/ para seu servidor'

author: SIAV Team
